name: VoiceStudyGuides
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: voice study guides
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Voice Study Guides skill enables you to go over your lessons anywhere, anytime through an Alexa smart speaker. The skill offers a collection of study guides created over our website voicestudyguides.com. Each study guide includes three types of learning methods: flashcards, practice questions, and sample tests. The contents of each method are tied to the other to offer a comprehensive learning experience. Users can learn terms and their definitions from flashcards, revise the terms with practice questions, and finally evaluate their level of understanding through sample tests. 

Users can access preferred study guides on Alexa by providing a four-digit code unique to each guide. This code is available on the voicestudyguides.com website. You can also design personalized study guides by breaking down the learning materials to be added as flashcards, practice questions, and sample tests. To accomplish this you need to sign up for free through the website. 

Our web app lets users from varied backgrounds create and customize guides to perfect their learning and knowledge retention. Businesses and employers can use this platform to create personalized study guides and train employees on existing processes and newly adopted systems. Educators can benefit from the three-tier model of the skill to create comprehensive voice-driven worksheets for their students. Students and academics can create unlimited study guides tailored around specific concepts or multiple topics for self-learning.

To understand the benefits of the app and learn how users can design exercises to review learning materials, try the getting started voice study guide using the code 1234. 

Once you’ve enabled the app on your Alexa device, just say Alexa, open Voice Study Guides, and provide the passcode to access a study guide of interest. Then you can use any of the following commands:

To learn through flashcards, just say: 
“Flashcards”

To access practice questions, say:
“Practice questions”

To undertake a sample test, say:
“Sample test”

For changing the guide, say:
“Change subject”

For more information on this app visit https://www.voicestudyguides.com/
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
